2.0.name: wordpress/snap-shots-for-wordpressorg
2.0.description:
PLUGIN FEATURES: * Generates perfectly valid XHTML code. * All Snap Shots options can be set via WP-Admin. * Options can be changed at anytime to customize the preview. * The plugin can automatically add the code to the footer.

Learn more about Snap Shots at http://www.snap.com/about/shots.php

REQUIREMENTS: WordPress 1.5 or above
